title: Textile, 18th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: plain weave with supplementary weft
description: Length of thin orange taffeta brocaded with typical Louis XV design of small bouquets in yellow, pale blue, pink, brown, green and white arranged with curving twisted lace ribbons brocaded in white silk floss.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 18th century. Medium: silk
Technique: plain weave with supplementary weft. 1949-114-16.
